Layers of Fear is a first-person psychedelic horror game with a heavy focus
on story and exploration. Players take control of a painter whose sole
purpose is to finish his Magnum Opus. The player must navigate through both
a constantly changing Victorian-era mansion and ghastly visions of the
painter's fragile and crumbling psyche.
